name: Anita Smith
text: I love dealing with these folks! Always very friendly and very helpful!!

name: Tim Abernathy
text: Been going to there auctions for a long time and I just enjoy them

name: MO Mules
text: Nice workers, easy to understand auction.

name: Alarida Treasures
text: Great Auctioneer!  Super helpful and friendly people.  Highly recommended!

name: Kiley Nakamura
text:
John Wesley Brooks is the Gold standard for real estate in North Alabama.  Courteous, Professional, Responsive, Trustworthy.  These qualities are exemplified by John day after day as he tirelessly works to find properties that meet my needs, negotiates with me on contracts, and helps me care for my properties after closing.  John gets the job done and he does things the right way - which is very important to me.  That's why I've been working with him for years now and will continue to do so in the years to come.

If you've been looking for a star agent to add to your team, look no further.

John Wesley Brooks, the way it should be.

resp.text:
Aloha!
Thanks so much Kiley!
I am glad I have been someone you can trust miles away! I am always around and 5 hours ahead to help any day!

name: Eddie Zhao
text: John is simply the best. From investors to first time home buyers, John’s got the expertise, knowledge, and network to get the job done for you. He’s reliable, communicative, and direct. Just 3 of the most important qualities in a realtor that you need to get your property sold or to get your dream home under contract. His awareness and knowledge of the local market surrounding huntsville still impresses me to this day and I have worked with John for 2-3 years now. With the market so rapidly changing month by month, I need someone like John in my circle. He’s not just a realtor, he’s my advisor that I trust 100%. Thank you john for all your commitment to me!

resp.text:
Thanks Eddie!
You guys are very kind! I appreciate your trust in me,  & the fact you have allowed me many times to assist you with your real estate investments in our Sweet Home Alabama!  You know I am always available!

name: Teresa Carter
text: John was professional,  prompt and easy to work with.  He worked very hard on my deal!! I will definitely continue to use his expertise on future deals!! Thank you John for great work!

name: Jennifer Havalchak
text: John was great to work with on all our home purchases.  He is very experienced, knows the market, easy to work with, and very professional.  He is quick to respond whether by text or phone 24/7.  We highly recommend him.  Thank you John!

resp.text: Thank you so much for allowing me repeatedly times to serve you and your family! I have enjoyed working with you guys!

name: Global Shield
text:
I’ve been using John for a few years now and he’s truly a real estate professional. Whenever I needed something from him, he’s always there to help. He’s very responsive and a great problem solver. John would go out of his ways for his clients and to get things done. He’s overall an exceptional realtor.
Sincerely,
Phong T.

resp.text: It has been my pleasure to help you with your real estate investments. You know I am always around!

name: Destiny Foster
text: Looking to sell or purchase? John will go above and beyond while catering to each client’s individual needs! With his real estate expertise, he is always finding new and creative ways to care for his clients. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank You So Much For Your recommendation!

name: Shannon Foster
text: John Wesley is the best realtor you could ever hope to have. He is an even better human being. John has many years of experience in the realestate industry. He comes from a long line of realtors and brokers. John will fight for you and help you make the best decision for you and your family.

resp.text:
Thanks Shannon!
You are right, You know how I will always work hard for my clients!

name: andrew bowden
text: Best AUCTION Team in the Southeast. Wonderful. Staff to work with, knowledge of equipment being sold. Always polite and friendly. Good auction deals on farm and construction equipment. Stop by the HEADLAND location an say hello.

resp.text: Thank you! Working with you was a pleasure and all the girls in the office enjoyed the doughnuts.
We hope to see you again. Thank you for the nice review.

name: christine lockwood
text: Beau Cole with Cole Auction is simply AMAZING.  I had a slew of mixed emotions going into this process and I have to say that Beau worked with me flawlessly.  On top of it, he came out $21k above my minimum reserve.  When in doubt and unsure of what to do... Cole Auction takes care of you 1000%

name: F Henderson
text: So far in my house hunting process,  Tonya Guthrie is one of the most professional and knowledgeable agents I've met. I would recommend her to anyone.

name: Susan Creado
text: The folks at Cole Auction are friendly, professional, and polite. They go above and above beyond to make the auction experience a smooth, simple, process for both buyer and seller. I highly recommend Beau Cole and the entire Cole Auction team.

name: DGS DGS
text: I got good deals but noticed some questionable behaviors. Offers a list of items to be auctioned but during auction jumps to lower items then previous item is suddently sold and bidders were left wondering what is actually being sold. I'm the meantime item got sold without anyone actually bidding.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to leave us feedback!  While we do make every attempt to follow the order of the printed catalog, it is sometimes necessary to deviate based on the item location and the amount of space we have to work with at each sale.  Our auctioneer will always announce the item number and description prior to selling each item. Your business is greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you at future auctions.  Sincerely, Beau Cole
